data.meta_site_name: Williamson Memorial Funeral Home & Cremation Services
data.text:
BOONE, Mr. Gregory Shawn, age 51 of Fairview, TN went home to be with the Lord on May 19, 2012. Graduated in 1978 from Fairview High School. Field Superintendent with Crawford Door Sales with 26 years of service. He enjoyed woodworking, gardening, and camping. Preceded in death by parents, Claude W. & Louise Carter Boone. Survived by: Loving wife, Donna Donoho Boone, son, Zackary Shawn Boone; sisters, Donna Boone Buttrey & Holly Boone Manley all of Fairview, TN; Father & Mother-in-law, Don & Barbara Donoho of Franklin; several nieces, nephews, and other loving family members; beloved canines, Boomer & Buddy. Celebration of Life Service will be held at 6:00pm Wednesday, May 23, 2012 at Grace Chapel, Steve Berger officiating. Graveside Service 11:00am Thursday, May 24, 2012 at Harpeth Hills Memory Gardens. Family & friends to serve as pallbearers. In lieu of flowers, memorials may be made to Josiah's House c/o Grace Chapel, 3279 Southall Rd. Franklin, TN 37064, in memory of Greg Boone. Visitation will be held 4-6pm Wednesday at Grace Chapel & 4-8pm Tuesday at WILLIAMSON MEMORIAL FUNERAL HOME (615) 794-2289. www.williamsonmemorial.com

Visitation Details

Tuesday, May 22nd, 2012 4:00pm - 8:00pm, Williamson Memorial Funeral Home

Wednesday, May 23rd, 2012 4:00pm - 6:00pm, Grace Chapel

Service Information

Wednesday, May 23rd, 2012 6:00pm, Grace Chapel

Interment Details

Harpeth Hills Memory Gardens
